short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Forward Kapta Notes, Complete/Update Tasks and Actions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This add on adds quick tools to create new notes in Kapta either from the send button or from a sidebar when viewing  emails with contacts currently in Kapta.  In addition it also provide easy sidebars for updating both Tasks and Actions when Kapta sends you emails about those items.
